page.description: The PROCESSING.HTM is a frameset used to show a header while a page within the frameset is processing.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: PROCESSING.HTM is a frameset than contains the PROCESSHEADER.A5W page in the topFrame and CHECKOUTCALC.A5W pages in the mainFrame.
section.note: Do not open this page in the WYSIWYG tab of the HTML Editor and then save it. This will result in the loss of Xbasic code, which the underlying Microsoft ActiveX control does not properly support.

section.title: Links
section.description: The CHECKOUTCOMP.A5W page calls the PROCESSING.HTM page.

section.title: Page Source
section.description: The definition of the frameset is as follows.
